item.title: Facebook claims that only native and video advertisements provide substantial value
item.description:
Facebook’s Head of Ad Tech, Dave Jakubowski, recently stated that exchanges and banners lack significant value in a blog post. He highlights that Facebook conducted a test using “a buying platform” within Atlas, their ad solution. The test revealed that despite reaching real people accurately, many ads were low-quality or fraudulent. Although effective in removing these poor ads, Facebook was surprised by the sheer volume of ineffective inventory. The test also demonstrated that only native and video ad formats yielded substantial value...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/facebook-claims-that-only-native-and-video-advertisements-provide-substantial-value/
